DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Quality of Life Erection Quality Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a scaled set of values rating interference from prostate cancer symptoms with individual satisfaction regarding hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis indicating arousal in males.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Quality of Life Erection Quality
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to changes in individual satisfaction regarding hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis indicating arousal in males due to interference from symptoms of prostate cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Property.preferredDefinition: Erection is the hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.:Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone.

Concepts.definition: The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.
An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Prostate Quality of Life Erection Quality Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a scaled set of values rating interference of prostate cancer symptoms with individual satisfaction with erection in sexual activity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
